title: Mullion Cove to Lizard Point Walk Route

images.title: Dr Neil Clifton / View over Mullion harbour
images.caption: View over Mullion harbour. Looking from the coastal path to the south. Of the buildings on the horizon, the leftmost one is the Mullion Cove Hotel.

images.title: Bob Jones / Mullion Cove slipway
images.caption: Mullion Cove slipway. Looking inland from the jetty.

images.title: Kenneth Allen / Lizard Point
images.caption: Lizard Point. Looking towards Enoch Rock. It is the most southerly point in Great Britain.

description: This walk follows a popular section of the South West Coast Path from Mullion Cove to Kynance Cove and the lighthouse at Lizard Point. It's about a 7 mile walk, following the undulating cliff top path with some fascinating geology, lovely beaches and excellent views along the way. The walk starts at the car park at Mullion Cove, just to the south of the Cornish village of Mullion. It's a very picturesque area with a pretty harbour and an interesting history. From here you can pick up the coastal path and follow it south to the Predannack Cliffs and Kynance Cove. This noteworthy spot is home to some wonderful rock formations and a beautiful beach. You continue south past Pentreath beach before coming to Lizard Point, the most southerly place in Britain. Here you'll find some more splendid sea views and the Lizard Lighthouse guarding the shore.

details.subtitle: Pubs/Cafes
details.content: The Mullion Cove Hotel is in a spectacular spot at the start of the walk. You can pop in for a cup of tea or something more substantial at this luxury retreat which commands fabulous views over the area.

details.subtitle: Further Information and Other Local Ideas
details.content: Head north along the coast path and you could visit some of the local highlights at Loe Bar on the National Trust's Penrose Estate in Helston. Near here there's also the delightful village of Gweek on the Helford River. Here you could try the nature trail at the seal sanctuary where they look after sick and injured seal pups.

display_address: Mullion Cove Hotel, Mullion Cove, Porth Mellin, Mullion, Cornwall, England, TR12 7EP, United Kingdom
